column5: I was flipping through the Toronto Sun today and saw Mepps' picture in a fishing Toronto article.  Anyone else catch that?
Yep, I saw and read that article myself.  It even mention's Clive's Fishingfury website.  Pretty cool.  Joey

If you guys are talking about the Toronto GTA fishing, here is the address of that article.  http://www.torontosun.com/News/TorontoAndG...017116-sun.html   Joey, are you the same Joey who caught the 28 pound carp ice fishing?  That is some fish and it was caught on a 4lb test line. It might be a record.  If it is you, congratulations - job well done.  carp-starter - a "WOW" fish  Here is that PIC -------
Yep...that's the same Joey!  She's no stranger to fame...she's been on Dave Mercer's show as well.
WTG Clive!! - stinking Joey anyway... media hog...
Now if only that had the Toronto Sun in Nova Scotia I could see it in person! They interviewed my fishing partner Jon for the article, then used my pic
Great article and congrats Clive!!! Hope the press generates tons of hits for your site. How's the weather been out east?  Cheers, 1leg
Yup, tis me.  Not a record tho.  Ontario/Canada does not have line class records.  Only USA and Worldwide.  Thanks tho!  And TJ -  Joey
1leg - weather has been terribly inconsitent in Nova Scotia. Getting warmer though, if this rain would go away we'd be great!
Very cool.  Mepps is becoming a regular Canadian fishing cover boy
